content.text: Welcome to today's blog promoting the publication of Agent Update: issue 86.

In the Technical Updates and Reminders section we continue to bring you important COVID-19 updates, including the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme.  Other topics included are VAT reverse charge, Online print and post for VAT registrations, and Corporate Interest Restriction.
Some of the highlights in the HMRC Agent Services section include Agent talking Points, Agent Services and Introducing "pay by bank account".
We hope you find this edition informative and don’t forget the next Agent Update is scheduled for August 2021.
Did you know that you can receive email alerts telling you about the latest publication of Agent Update?
